tweet: Today, we’re happy to publish the first group of Cardano Ambassadors! Since launching the program 4 weeks ago, we received hundreds of nominations and were ecstatic to see the enthusiasm across the global Cardano community. Read more here  https://t.co/B79ixxjgqF #CardanoCommunity

Amazing turnout at the Japan Blockchain Conference, both on and off the stage! Talks were done by Charles Hoskinson and members of Emurgo. We had Cardano community members come out too! #japanblockchainconference #JBC #CardanoCommunity  https://t.co/g7WVqtSLit

A study by a group of student researchers hav found vulnerabilities within proof-of-stake (PoS) cryptocurrencies, affecting up to 26 coins, however, it appears Cardano is not one of them! Read more here:    https://t.co/s1s66qHigP

Researchers find exploit in 26 proof-of-stake coins; Cardano unaffected  https://t.co/A5QQEbXykB @Cardano #cardano #blockchain
